subject: Re: Thermacell CTV Pixel Implementation
preview: Hi Bonnie,  Thanks for the follow-up.  Happy to confirm this has now been completed. The Turn tracking beacon has been implemented via Google Tag Manager and is firing on the dedicated Thank You / O

full_threads.body:
Hi Bonnie,

Thanks for the follow-up.

Happy to confirm this has now been completed. The Turn tracking beacon has
been implemented via Google Tag Manager and is firing on the dedicated
Thank You / Order Confirmation page as requested.

If you need any further checks or additional trackers applied once you’re
back, just let us know - happy to help.

Wishing you a great break over the next couple of weeks.


Warmly,
*Adriane Roa *
support@wolfiq.com.au
<https://wolfiq.com.au> <https://wolfiq.com.au> [image: Wolf IQ Logo]
<https://wolfiq.com.au>
*Holiday Trading 🎄🧑🎄*
• The Wolf IQ team will be taking a short break for the holidays to
recharge for 2026
• Our office will be closed *Monday, 22 Dec* and returning on *Monday, 5
January*
• Wolf IQ Support will continue to be available for anything urgent (just
send us an email)

*Wolf IQ doesn't just fix websites - we can help you...*
✔ Get you more real, authentic 5-star *Google reviews*
✔ Launch *landing pages* for new marketing campaigns
✔ Run *digital health checks* on your online presence
✔ See what your visitors really want with *website heatmaps*

Just *reply to this email *with how we can help (or learn more at
WolfIQ.com/services <https://www.wolfiq.com.au/services>).

*About your Care Plan*
• Care Plans include hosting, maintenance and dedicated support each month.
• Essentials – 15 minutes / Pro – 120 minutes / Expert – 300 minutes.
• Additional is billed at $147/hr (ex GST) at the end of the month.
• Anything else we can help with? Start a new email—it helps us move faster
and serve you better.
_____________________________
